wiki.content:
For Thom, this song is special. Although he has never offered an explanation of it, throughout 1995-96, when the band played it live, he did introduce it in various ways - declaring, for instance, that the song is about "Sex in the morning. Which is the best time to have it. As long as you've cleaned your teeth beforehand". The lyrics probe the destruction of a relationship and touch on sex with a third party.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: For Thom, this song is special. Although he has never offered an explanation of it, throughout 1995-96, when the band played it live, he did introduce it in various ways - declaring, for instance, that the song is about "Sex in the morning. Which is the best time to have it. As long as you've cleaned your teeth beforehand". The lyrics probe the destruction of a relationship and touch on sex with a third party.

track.name: Black Star
comments: Good song
Least favorite.

"i get on the train and i just stand about, now that i dont think of youuuuu"
omg this hits home so hard
the most "instantly likeable" Radiohead song, but not the best :) Still is one of my favourite Radiohead songs.
the best
dat bass
Goddamn, the bass and drums BRING IT on this song. What a groove!!
i love this...
Bassline.
maybe the best radiohead song?!
http://www.coverdude.com/covers/timati-black-star-inside-cover-13873.jpg

Jeez, don't get so butthurt. Just because I said "sounds like Muse" doesn't mean that Muse came first. I am fully aware that Muse came well after Radiohead and was likely inspired by them. It just sounded really silly to say "Muse sounds like that chorus."
That IS funny...the Muse comment, but cut the kid some slack. He's only 15 and wasn't even ALIVE when this record came out.
My favourite track off The Bends.  Absolutely can't get enough of that riff.
One of the best Radiohead tracks, IMHO.
Uhm, Muse is soo much like this chorus... This was first.
"That chorus sounds so much like Muse." hahahaha oh wow

"That chorus sounds so much like Muse."

Oh dear.
I am in love with this song.
